name: Cookie Clicker
summary:
Cookie Clicker is a Javascript game released by Orteil on August 10, 2013. It is a "incrementer" game, as proclaimed by Orteil. The point of the game is to bake cookies by clicking on a giant cookie until you have enough cookies to buy upgrades. The seemingly endless gameplay makes it a game that can last an indefinite amount of time, or at least until your computer can no longer run it.

via http://cookieclicker.wikia.com/wiki/Cookie_Clicker_Wiki
